properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 1 at 8:07PM PST until January 3 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph
possible.

* WHERE...In California, the Shasta Valley in central Siskiyou
County. Strongest winds will be near Weed. In Oregon, the
southern end of the Rogue Valley in Jackson County from Phoenix
southward, including the cities of Talent and Ashland.

* WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power
lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be
difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
